name: Frogbert
description:
Controll Frogbert, a frog who lives alone in a lake. And his favourite activity? Catching files!

This game was made for Mini Jam 79 and is only playable on the web.
Windows build coming after jam is over.
Planning to post source code on github so people can make a Linux or MacOS build.

Have fun playing. Make sure to report any glitches or bugs in the comments.

HOW TO PLAY

  • Use the arrow keys or A and D to hop from one lilly pad to the other on the left/right side
  • Use the Q or E key to shoot out your tounge. You can shoot out you tounge on lilly pads and mod-air too. You can also catch flies with your body.
